main_definition: Somebody refers to an unspecified or unknown person, often used in the context of seeking assistance or when a specific individual is not identified.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An unidentified person who may require help
meanings_and_examples.example: If you're lost in an unfamiliar city, looking for somebody to guide you.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used as a placeholder when the specific identity of a person is unknown or irrelevant
meanings_and_examples.example: I need somebody to sign this document on my behalf.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in casual conversation to refer to any person without specifying who they are
meanings_and_examples.example: Somebody forgot their umbrella, so we shared ours with them.
